page.title: 04HONING REARING GAME
page.content: My dad works on a farm and he raises over 100 young pheasants that are bought from a breeding farm at 2 to 3 weeks old, each year. I help him to get the pheasants into a hut to protect them from foxes. I have to debeak them and put them in crates to take down the loke,and put them in another shed. We have to take a heater and a supply of gas and check regularly that they have food and water. When they get a little bigger and roam further afield I walk round to see if there are any poachers around. My dad takes his double barrelled twelve bore gun. We walk down the loke and across the fields and past a wood. Dad and I have disturbed poachers in the past, who have escaped in their cars.
